import"./Document.css";import{useLocation,useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{loadDocument}from'../../model/actions';import{MDBContainer,MDBRow,MDBCol}from"mdb-react-ui-kit";/** This is the seperate page where Documents are presented * docID-> doc._id * location = */import{isPhone}from"../../App";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Document(){var _useParams=useParams(),docID=_useParams.docID;var location=useLocation();var docSummary=location.state.docSummary;var phoneClass="";//console.log('isphone:', isPhone) if(isPhone){phoneClass=" d-flex flex-column mb-3";}//get summary //get full doc var docFull="";var dispatch=useDispatch();var _useSelector=useSelector(function(state){return state.data;}),doc=_useSelector.doc;useEffect(function(){dispatch(loadDocument({docID:docID}));/*if (doc) { console.log("DOC in Document.js:",doc['fullText']) }*/},[docFull]);//.then(response => console.log("response!:",response)) docFull=doc['fullText'];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MDBContainer,{className:"DocPage "+phoneClass,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:docID}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDBCol,{className:"DocSummary Both",children:docSummary}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDBCol,{className:"FullText Both",children:docFull})]})/*

{docID}
